verses.text: Be \w merciful|strong="H2603"\w* unto me, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: for \w man|strong="H0582"\w* would swallow me \w up|strong="H7602"\w*; he \w fighting|strong="H3898"\w* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \w oppresseth|strong="H3905"\w* me.\f + \fr 56.1 \ft Michtamâ€¦: or, A golden Psalm of David\f*

Mine \w enemies|strong="H8324"\w* would \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \w swallow|strong="H7602"\w* \add me\add* up: for \add they be\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* that \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against me, O thou most \w High|strong="H4791"\w*.\f + \fr 56.2 \ft enemies: Heb. observers\f*
What \w time|strong="H3117"\w* I am \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, I will \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in thee.

In \w God|strong="H0430"\w* I will \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, in \w God|strong="H0430"\w* I have put my \w trust|strong="H0982"\w*; I will not \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* what \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* can \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto me.
Every \w day|strong="H3117"\w* they \w wrest|strong="H6087"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: all their \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* \add are\add* against me for \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

They gather themselves \w together|strong="H1481"\w*, they \w hide|strong="H6845"\w* themselves, they \w mark|strong="H8104"\w* my \w steps|strong="H6119"\w*, when they \w wait|strong="H6960"\w* for my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.

Shall they \w escape|strong="H6405"\w* by \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*? in \add thine\add* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* cast \w down|strong="H3381"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Thou \w tellest|strong="H5608"\w* my \w wanderings|strong="H5112"\w*: \w put|strong="H7760"\w* thou my \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* into thy \w bottle|strong="H4997"\w*: \add are they\add* not in thy \w book|strong="H5612"\w*?

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* I \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \add unto thee\add*, then shall mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w*: this I \w know|strong="H3045"\w*; for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* for me.

In \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will I \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \add his\add* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*: in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will I \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* \add his\add* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*.
In \w God|strong="H0430"\w* have I put my \w trust|strong="H0982"\w*: I will not be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* what \w man|strong="H0120"\w* can \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto me.
Thy \w vows|strong="H5088"\w* \add are\add* upon me, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I will \w render|strong="H7999"\w* \w praises|strong="H8426"\w* unto thee.

For thou hast \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: \add wilt\add* not \add thou deliver\add* my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* from \w falling|strong="H1762"\w*, that I may \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w living|strong="H2416"\w*?
